name: GruffaloMove
0:
”Alexa, open Gruffalo Move”
”Alexa, play Gruffalo Move”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gruffalo move
Developer Terms of Use
des: Join Mouse in the deep dark wood with this immersive and interactive voice game. Ask Alexa, "open Gruffalo Move" and enter the magical world of Julia Donaldson and Axel Scheffler's much loved characters. Based on the award winning animation by Magic Light Pictures, you can explore sound and music as you meet a new animal day by day. Tip-toe like Fox, "Toowhit toowhoo" with Owl and slither with Snake to complete all the activities and unlock the soothing sleep sounds in time to say goodnight to your little Gruffalo.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
